teaser: Global markets are mixed this morning after China reported that inflation hit a ten-month high in February and consumer spending came in worse than expected.
title: Chinese consumers hit tough times
contentencoded:
Global markets were mixed this morning after China reported that inflation hit a ten-month high in February and consumer spending came in worse than expected.

Julia Coronado, chief economist with the investment bank BNP Paribas, joined Marketplace Morning Report host Jeremy Hobson to discuss how the latest data from China is likely to impact the global economy.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, March 11, 2013
description: Global markets are mixed this morning after China reported that inflation hit a ten-month high in February and consumer spending came in worse than expected.
